articles.title: Microsoft expects Xbox to deliver record-breaking revenue during Starfield's release - TweakTown

articles.content:
According to internal forecasts published by Microsoft CFO Amy Hood, the Xbox games division is expected to deliver record-breaking revenues in Q1 FY24.
Xbox could start a new year with record-break… [+1574 chars]
